languages.text: Говорят, Вольный Торговец {name} фон Валанциус никогда не упустит выгоду, даже если для этого приходится сдирать дань с жалких мусорщиков.

traits.locale_text: Говорят, Вольный Торговец {name} фон Валанциус никогда не упустит выгоду, даже если для этого приходится сдирать дань с жалких мусорщиков.

languages.text: People are saying that Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius never misses an opportunity to make a profit, even if that means shaking down pitiful scavengers for tribute.
languages.original_text: Говорят, Вольный Торговец {name} фон Валанциус никогда не упустит выгоду, даже если для этого приходится сдирать дань с жалких мусорщиков.

traits.locale_text: People are saying that Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius never misses an opportunity to make a profit, even if that means shaking down pitiful scavengers for tribute.
People are saying that Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius never misses an opportunity to make a profit, even if that means shaking down pitiful scavengers for tribute.
People are saying that Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius never misses an opportunity to make a profit, even if that means shaking down pitiful scavengers for tribute.
People are saying that Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius never misses an opportunity to make a profit, even if that means shaking down pitiful scavengers for tribute.

languages.text: 人们都说，行商浪人{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯从来不会放过任何赚钱的机会。即便这意味着要从可怜的拾荒者身上榨取钱财，行商浪人也绝不会手下留情。
languages.original_text: People are saying that Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius never misses an opportunity to make a profit, even if that means shaking down pitiful scavengers for tribute.

traits.locale_text: 人们都说，行商浪人{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯从来不会放过任何赚钱的机会。即便这意味着要从可怜的拾荒者身上榨取钱财，行商浪人也绝不会手下留情。

languages.text: 人々は、自由開拓者{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウスは、たとえそれが哀れな回収業者を叩きのめすことを意味するとしても、貢物のために利益を得る機会を決して逃さないと言っている。
languages.original_text: People are saying that Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius never misses an opportunity to make a profit, even if that means shaking down pitiful scavengers for tribute.

traits.locale_text: 人々は、自由開拓者{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウスは、たとえそれが哀れな回収業者を叩きのめすことを意味するとしても、貢物のために利益を得る機会を決して逃さないと言っている。

languages.text: La gente dice que {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente {name} von Valancius no deja pasar una oportunidad de sacar tajada aunque sea extorsionando a unos lastimeros recolectores.
languages.original_text: People are saying that Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius never misses an opportunity to make a profit, even if that means shaking down pitiful scavengers for tribute.

traits.locale_text: La gente dice que {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente {name} von Valancius no deja pasar una oportunidad de sacar tajada aunque sea extorsionando a unos lastimeros recolectores.

languages.text: Es heißt, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin} {name} von Valancius verpasst keine Gelegenheit, sich zu bereichern. Dabei schreckt er nicht einmal vor Tributzahlungen von bedauernswerten Plünderern zurück.
languages.original_text: People are saying that Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius never misses an opportunity to make a profit, even if that means shaking down pitiful scavengers for tribute.

traits.locale_text: Es heißt, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin} {name} von Valancius verpasst keine Gelegenheit, sich zu bereichern. Dabei schreckt er nicht einmal vor Tributzahlungen von bedauernswerten Plünderern zurück.

languages.text: Les gens disent que {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} {name} von Valancius ne manque jamais l'occasion de faire des profits, même si cela implique de racketter de misérables charognards.
languages.original_text: People are saying that Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius never misses an opportunity to make a profit, even if that means shaking down pitiful scavengers for tribute.

traits.locale_text: Les gens disent que {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} {name} von Valancius ne manque jamais l'occasion de faire des profits, même si cela implique de racketter de misérables charognards.

languages.text: İnsanlar, Hür Tacir {name} von Valancius'un kâr elde etme fırsatlarını asla kaçırmadığını konuşuyor. Bedeli zavallı hurdacıları soyup soğana çevirmek bile olsa.
languages.original_text: People are saying that Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius never misses an opportunity to make a profit, even if that means shaking down pitiful scavengers for tribute.

traits.locale_text: İnsanlar, Hür Tacir {name} von Valancius'un kâr elde etme fırsatlarını asla kaçırmadığını konuşuyor. Bedeli zavallı hurdacıları soyup soğana çevirmek bile olsa.
